name: The Ballad Of the Liar
description:
This game takes you through the story of a good guy VERUM who is kidnapped by MENDAX and kept in a prison. VERUM is offered help by SEGUM , who is a former prisoner, and SEGUM guides him the way out of the prison. But the story also have a lot of twists which you will find by playing the game.

Developed by : ZeroByte Gaming
Developer : Srijal Gupta
Contributors : Aaditya Kumar , Ritesh Kumar
